Package com.mygdx.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Block
    class of the game character
    BlockSelector
    class of the block selector menu
    Button
    button class
    Game
    main class of the application
    GameContactListener
    class used for game collisions
    GameData
    represents all the important info and data to the game
    GameOverMenu
    class of the game over menu
    GameUI
    represents the interface where the game is running
    HUD
    class that represents the interface displayed on top of the game where the player can check important info
    Level
    class that represents each game level
    LevelComplete
    represents the level complete menu class
    LevelScenario  
    LevelSelector
    menu where the player can choose what level to play
    MainMenu
    class of the main Menu
    Menu
    represents the abstract menu superclass
    PauseMenu
    represents the pause menu class
    Settings
    class to edit the game settings
    SquarePlatform
    class that represents a platform where the block can slide or jump to
    TriangleObstacle  
    Tutorial
    menu where the player can learn how to play
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Block.State
    enum types that allows to check if the block is sliding on the floor/platforms, or jumping
    GameData.GameState
    enum types used to the define the current state of the program
